sentences.en: The autobiographic novel, Out of Africa, is Isak Denisens most famous work, which has been adapted into an American film with the same title.
sentences.cn: 自传体小说《走出非洲》是丹麦女作家伊萨克·迪内森最著名的一部作品，并被改编成同名美国电影。

sentences.en: The Bell Jar, an autobiographic novel written by Sylvia Plath, gives a sufficient expression to the essence of social life.
sentences.cn: 《钟罩》虽然是美国自白派著名女诗人西尔维亚·普拉斯的自传体小说，但相当充分地反映了社会生活的本质。

sentences.en: The third - person narrative is adopted in Jade Snow Wong s autobiographic novel Fifth Chinese Daughter.
sentences.cn: 黄玉雪在其自传体小说《华女阿五》中采用了第三人称叙述视角.

sentences.en: Through an autobiographic writing, I have intertwined two clues of subjective feelings and objective reasoning.
sentences.cn: 透过自传式的书写,将主观心灵与客观理性两条线索, 交织纠缠.

sentences.en: Villette is autobiographic psychological novel of Charlotte Bronte.
sentences.cn: 《维莱特》是夏洛蒂?勃朗特的一本自传体心理小说.

words.tran_cn: 自传的；自传体的；自传作家的
